page.title: 06INDUSTRY
page.content: There are only two main industries in our block.Toolchrome and the joint companies of Ball Plastics and B.E.F. Toolchrome,established 1957,mainly coats bars and working parts with hard chrome to reduce wear.The process is by electro_plating using only 4.5 volts but up to 2,000 amps. Items are cleaned in sulphuric acid and pre_coated with copper and nickel to prevent corrosion.B.E.F.is a plastic injection moulding firm that manufactures products ranging from animal feeders to plant holders and garden containers.Machines,which vary in size according to the product,are cooled by refridgerated water.They are either hydraulic or air pressured. the tools which are in two parts cost from Â£ 10,000_Â£ 40,000 are often coated or re_coated with hard chrome by Toolchrome.
